TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit ProgressBarRenderer extends System.Object
public ref class ProgressBarRenderer abstract sealed
.class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ProgressBarRenderer extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供用于以视觉样式呈现进度栏控件的方法。

span.span: Provides methods used to render a progress bar control with visual styles.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类提供一组 `static` 方法，这些方法可用于使用操作系统的当前视觉样式呈现进度栏控件。The class provides a set of `static` methods that can be used to render a progress bar control with the current visual style of the operating system. 呈现控件是指绘制控件的用户界面。Rendering a control refers to drawing the user interface of a control. 如果要绘制的自定义控件应具有当前视觉样式的外观，此方法非常有用。This is useful if you are drawing a custom control that should have the appearance of the current visual style. 若要绘制进度栏，请使用 或 方法绘制空条形，然后使用 或 方法绘制填充条形的元素。To draw a progress bar, use the or methods to draw the empty bar, and then use the or methods to draw the elements that fill in the bar. 如果在操作系统中启用了视觉样式，并将视觉样式应用于应用程序窗口的工作区，则此类的方法将用当前视觉样式绘制进度栏。If visual styles are enabled in the operating system and visual styles are applied to the client area of application windows, the methods of this class will draw the progress bar with the current visual style. 否则，此类的方法和属性将引发 。Otherwise, the methods and properties of this class will throw an . 若要确定是否可以使用此类的成员，可以检查 属性的值。To determine whether the members of this class can be used, you can check the value of the property. 此类包装设置为 、、和 类公开的元素之一的 功能。This class wraps the functionality of a that is set to one of the elements exposed by the , , , and classes. 有关详细信息，请参阅[使用视觉样式呈现控件](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/rendering-controls-with-visual-styles)。For more information, see [Rendering Controls with Visual Styles](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/rendering-controls-with-visual-styles). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建一个自定义控件，该控件使用 和 方法来绘制垂直进度栏。The following code example demonstrates how to create a custom control that uses the and methods to draw a vertical progress bar. 该控件使用 来重绘进度栏，每秒添加一次。The control uses a to redraw the progress bar with an added piece each second. `SetupProgressBar` 方法使用 和 属性来计算绘制的每个递增的矩形的高度。The `SetupProgressBar` method uses the and properties to calculate the height of each progressively larger rectangle that is drawn. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer#0](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer/cpp/form1.cpp#0)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer/CS/form1.cs#0)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer#0](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer/VB/form1.vb#0)]

summary.span: 获取进度栏每个内部格之间的间距的宽度（以像素为单位）。

span.span: Gets the width, in pixels, of the space between each inner piece of the progress bar.

value.span: 进度栏每个内部格之间的间距的宽度（以像素为单位）。

span.span: The width, in pixels, of the space between each inner piece of the progress bar.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此值取决于操作系统的当前视觉样式。This value is determined by the current visual style of the operating system. 在访问此属性之前，应验证 属性是否返回了 `true`。Before accessing this property, you should verify that the property returns `true`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用 属性来确定每个矩形的大小，该矩形表示 方法绘制的进度栏的增量。The following code example uses the property to determine the size of each rectangle that represents an increment of the progress bar drawn by the method. 此代码示例是为 类提供的更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer/cpp/form1.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer/CS/form1.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer/VB/form1.vb#4)]

exception.span: 操作系统不支持视觉样式。

span.span: The operating system does not support visual styles.
-or-

exception.span: 用户在操作系统中禁用视觉样式。

span.span: Visual styles are disabled by the user in the operating system.
-or-

exception.span: 视觉样式不应用于应用程序窗口的工作区。

span.span: Visual styles are not applied to the client area of application windows.

span.span: The used to draw the progress bar.

param.name: bounds
param.span: ，它指定进度栏格填充的范围。

span.span: The that specifies the bounds to be filled by progress bar pieces.

summary.span: 绘制填充水平进度栏的一组进度栏格。

span.span: Draws a set of progress bar pieces that fill a horizontal progress bar.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法绘制的每个进度栏段都跨越 `bounds` 参数的高度。Each progress bar piece drawn by this method spans the height of the `bounds` parameter. 绘制的进度栏数取决于 `bounds` 的宽度和 和 属性返回的值。The number of progress bar pieces drawn is determined by the width of `bounds` and the values returned by the and properties. 使用此方法之前，应验证 属性是否返回了 `true`。Before using this method, you should verify that the property returns `true`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法绘制的每个进度栏段跨越 `bounds` 参数的宽度。Each progress bar piece drawn by this method spans the width of the `bounds` parameter. 绘制的进度栏数取决于 `bounds` 的高度和 和 返回的值。The number of progress bar pieces drawn is determined by the height of `bounds` and the values returned by and . 使用此方法之前，应验证 属性是否返回了 `true`。Before using this method, you should verify that the property returns `true`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用 事件处理程序中的 方法来绘制进度栏的每个增量。The following code example uses the method in a event handler to draw each increment of a progress bar. 此代码示例是为 类提供的更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 `false`此属性，则此类的方法和属性将引发 。If this property is `false`, the methods and properties of this class will throw an . ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用 属性来确定是否调用 方法。The following code example uses the property to determine whether to call the method. 此代码示例是为 类提供的更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class.
